item.title: The 5 things you need to ‘really create magic’ with AI: the LLM, the context, the prompt, the workflow, and the evaluation
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: The pirate flag from anime ‘One Piece’ is Indonesia’s newest protest symbol—and officials are cracking down
item.description: Officials warn the "provocation"—seen as a protest against President Prabowo's policies—should not fly alongside the country's red-and-white flag.

item.title: TSMC secrets leak puts Japan’s Tokyo Electron on hot seat
item.description: The Japanese company is struggling to address the potential fallout with one of its most important customers and with governments in Tokyo and Taipei.

item.title: Intel CEO dogged by decades of China chip bets, board work
item.description: Donald Trump called Lip-Bu Tan “highly conflicted” in a social media post and urged him to resign.

item.title: AI-driven layoffs are shrinking the job market for recent grads
item.description: AI is becoming a major driver of workforce reductions, with over 10,000 job cuts in 2025 directly linked to automation, according to new data.
